title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 51 - Uniform Hearing Procedures
content:

§ 51.1 - Applicability
§ 51.2 - Definitions
§ 51.3 - Notice of hearing and statement of charges
§ 51.4 - Adjournment
§ 51.5 - Answer or responsive pleading
§ 51.6 - Amendment of pleadings
§ 51.7 - Service of papers
§ 51.8 - Disclosure
§ 51.9 - Hearing officer
§ 51.10 - Stipulations and consent orders

§ 51.12 - Hearing officer's report
§ 51.13 - Filing of exceptions
§ 51.14 - Final determination and order

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 51

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§12-a, 206-a, 230, 577, 2801-a, 2803-d, 2806, 2897-a, 3393, 3511; State Administrative Procedure

Act, §§ 301, 401; L. 1991, ch. 606, § 29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
